Dilley Police Department

 

In an Emergency Dial 911

Mission Statement: 

Our mission is to protect and serve our community with integrity, professionalism, and compassion. We are committed to maintaining public safety, upholding the law, and fostering trust through transparent and respectful interactions. By working collaboratively with residents and partners, we strive to enhance the quality of life and ensure a safe, just, and secure environment for all.

Vision Statement:

Our vision is to be a leader in community-oriented policing, where innovative strategies and proactive engagement create a safe, inclusive, and thriving environment for all. We aim to build strong, trusting relationships with the community, foster a culture of excellence and accountability within our department, and continuously evolve to meet the needs of those we serve.

Steven Hernandez
Chief of Police
City of Dilley
